attributes.action: Implement a fair system for carers who travel with the disabled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call upon the Local concils of G.B to implement free travel for all carers of the disabled who are entitled to free travel.  This is as most carers are on low incomes and money can be tight but if given a free travel pass to travel with there charge it would take a lot of the strain financally.
